recipesJson.name: 1 2 3 Pink CakeBawlz
recipesJson.author: Deetzz
recipesJson.description:
I have been playing around with a few simple recipes and ended up liking this one quite alot. Inspired by ID10-T 1 2 3 recipes, I made some Icing with a little bit of Cake!

Very Simple and Tasty Cake with Strawberry Icing! and its an Extra dollop of Gooey Strawberry Icing, Just How I Like it!! I mean, What is a cake without Icing... a dry piece of boring spongy nothing!! that's what it is!! So Icing is King!

This little mix explodes with flavor, that sweet sweet Strawberry Flavor and Really pays homage to my Favorite... Strawberry Shisha!

Add SS if you like.
good as a SnV but get much better after a steep

Give this a Mix If you Love Strawberries!!!

reviews.text:
Simple but also great. Remember me at Cake Pop recipe. It gives me much ideas for diffrent variations.
Thanks for the recipe. Good Job!
